## casify() function

Transform casing of a string, for example from kebab-case to camelCase

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function casify(str: string, config?: Partial<CasifyConfig>): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | string from which casing will be transformed |
|  config | Partial&lt;[CasifyConfig](./common.casifyconfig.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
